item.title: breaded meat medallions
item.description: 2 pounds of ground beef 1 grated onion 1/2 tablespoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper powder 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg 4 eggs 1 1/2 cup cookie powder frying fat 8 toasted bread medallions mustard sauce Place the meat in a bowl and add the onion, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Integrate well add 2 eggs, integrating each one ligating well. Add cracker meal to give consistency to the dough, but it should still be soft.
